title: FS: NEW Group of Low Grade T206 w/ HOF's and SL's **PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Group of Low Grade T206 w/ HOF's and SL's **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T206 lot available for sale. Most of these are obviously low grade. Condition should be accurately reflected by the scans but please feel free to ask any questions. Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. 3 or more ship for free. Payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier reading):

Abstein - $18
Clark - $20
Dessau (Sweet Caporal wet transfer on front) -$40
Donohue - $28
Doolan - $14
Ganzel - $14
Gray - $5 **ON HOLD**
Jackson - $14
Knight - $13
Konetchy (SGC 20) - $21
McElveen - $5 **ON HOLD**
O'Leary (pinhole near top border) - $14
Pfeister - $9
Powell - $15
Rhoades - $8
Rhodes - $16
Rudolph - $14
Schlei (huge border) - $18
Smith - $9
Spade (Sovereign) - $20
Tinker (HOF, overprint back) - $70
One bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!

Hey Marc,

The group of T206 cards from this lot has safely arrived; just wanted to let you know they look great and thanks again!  Happy new year,

Rick.
Ok mate send me the bill. PWE is fine for shipping.   Tony
